name: Who Put Pepper in my Dress??!?
name_original: Who Put Pepper in my Dress??!?
description:
The long awaited evening is finally here and it is of paramount importance that you be dressed for the occassion: your date with Taylor. Fetching your favourite dress you notice the smell of pepper...

Embark on a frantic adventure to find the attire of the evening and rid it of the pepper that has infested it.

But why is there pepper? Will you be able to get it out in time? And most importantly: who put pepper in your dress?

----

How to play:

The object of the game is to get pepper out of as many articles of clothing as possible.

The game is played using two keys to rotate the clothing. The keys are shuffled for each new clothing article.

The game ends when the timer ends without all pepper having been removed.

See if you can get the good ending and solve the mystery :)

----

Project made during Nordic Game Jam 2023 with the prompts:

fashion, understanding, and pepper.
